thread.title: The Cool Hotel Guide: Laura Ashley Hotel, The Belsfield, Bowness-on-Windermere, Cumbria
thread.title_full: The Cool Hotel Guide: Laura Ashley Hotel, The Belsfield, Bowness-on-Windermere, Cumbria

title: The Cool Hotel Guide: Laura Ashley Hotel, The Belsfield, Bowness-on-Windermere, Cumbria
text:
The rooms are immaculately furnished Giles Christopher/Media Wisdom 2 of 3 The hotel sits on Lake Windermere Giles Christopher/Media Wisdom 3 of 3 Tom Chesshyre Published 1 minute ago 
You get some of the best views in the Lake District from the terrace and many of the rooms of Laura Ashley Hotel, The Belsfield. Beyond a sweeping lawn, Windermere curves northwards and southwards, with sloping hills in the distance and a bowler hat-shaped island in the foreground. On a summer’s day, all is activity: ferries dart about, rowers in wooden boats set forth, tourists stroll by the water’s edge stopping at ice cream kiosks. The sky shifts colour as clouds slide by. The Belsfield, as it is known locally, is in a prominent position in Bowness. In a nutshel
